section.name: Source code
section.subsection:
This project's CVS repository can be checked out through anonymous CVS with the following instruction set. When prompted for a password for anonymous, enter "anonymuscvsuser".
$ cvs -d :pserver:anonymuscvsuser@cvs.key-tec.de:/php-maven login $ cvs -z3 -d :pserver:anonymuscvsuser@cvs.key-tec.de:/php-maven co org.phpmaven.multimaster
